title: See New Thread--FT/S: Six graded, featuring EPDG, Tolstoi, H-o-F, SP, Jumbo--
author: dougscats

posts.post_title: See New Thread--FT/S: Six graded, featuring EPDG, Tolstoi, H-o-F, SP, Jumbo--
posts.post_content:
I've given individual prices, but I don't want to sell cards individually, only in lots of $100 or more.  Free shipping at that point.

First come, first served.  "I'll take it" trumps any other negotiations.

Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] [Net54-generated emails sometimes wind up in my Junk mail, so email me directly from your home site] or post here. No pm's, please, unless necessary.

Ppff [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] or pay by check.
Regular paypal, buyer pays the fee.

Graded: Scans upon request:    

BRESNAHAN, batting, EPDG, BVG 3.5, $325,
Clancy, Piedmont 350, SGC 30, Jumbolaya! [measuring 2 3/4"] $55
Dineen, Old Mill, SGC 20, $55,
Kleinow catching, Bos,  SC 460/25, ~SP], SGC 50, $235,
MARQUARD, hands at sides, RC, EPDG, SGC 30 [very nice Good], $295,
Quillen, Piedmont, SGC A [Looks Ex, presumably trimmed], $28


--SOLD--For the record, the cards below have been sold on this thread:

Cobb, bat on, Poor [Fair+ front, paper-loss on back], [STRIKE]$1,175[/STRIKE], $1,125--SOLD--
BENDER, no trees, Tolstoi, SGC 30, partial name on top and bottom, $265,
Burke, Old Mill, BVG 2, $60
Harry Davis, Davis on front, SC 460/25, SGC 40, $[STRIKE]80[/STRIKE], $75
Marquard, hands at sides, RC, EPDG, SGC 20 [very nice Fair;],--$240
Bender, no trees, EPDG, SGC 20 ["68" written in ink on back, otherwise beautiful card-- I’d think it would be PSA 4/MK]-- $270,
Overall, hands at waist, Tolstoi, PSA 3.5, $165
McIntyre, Bkln and Chi, SC 460/25, VG, $65,
Randall, SC 350/30, Howard H. Dubree back-stamp, $35
Devore, Sovereign 460/25 [decent-looking card, but the bottom border looks fishy to me, so my guess is trimmed], $38.
BRESNAHAN, batting, Piedmont, SGC 20, $[STRIKE]85,[/STRIKE] $80
Howell, SC 460/30, SGC 45, $50,
Malarkey, Sweet Caporal 350/30, SGC 40, $42,
Sheckard throwing, SC 460/42, VG-Ex, $42,--SOLD--
Lake, arms in air, ST.L, SC 460/30, VG, $38,--SOLD--
Hinchman, Clev, Piedmont 150/25, G-VG, $30,--SOLD--
Shaw, ST. L, Piedmont 150/25, [slight speck of paper-loss in back left corner], $27,--SOLD--
Barbeau, Piedmont 350/25, Fair+, $22,--SOLD--Owen, Piedmont SGC 20, $25--SOLD--
Marquard, SC 460/30, was PSA 4 (MC).  I cracked this out because I didn't see any miscut.  It does have a slight, partial name on top; maybe that's it.--SOLD--
Cy Young throwing, SC 150/30, P [Fair+ front; paper-loss on back]; $285,--SOLD--
Lajoie throwing, Piedmont 350/25, G-, [STRIKE]$300[/STRIKE] $275--SOLD--
Bresnahan batting, Piedmont 350/25, G,--SOLD--
Mathewson, white cap, SC 350/30, --SOLD--
M. Brown, Cubs on shirt, Piedmont 150/25, Fair,--SOLD--
Bresnahan, portrait, Piedmont 150/25, ? [Could be G, with stain on front.  Might be trimmed, but it came from original owner's grandson, who got many of them graded, none of them trimmed.  And none of the others I bought were trimmed.], $70 --SOLD--
Willis batting, Piedmont 460/25, G+,--SOLD--
Griffith batting, Polar Bear, G--SOLD--
Herzog standing, Piedmont 150/25, Ex, $45,--SOLD--
Fletcher, SC 350/30, G-VG, $30,--SOLD--
Smith, Shreveport, SL, Piedmont 350/25, VG, $75,--SOLD--
Puttman, Piedmont 350/25, G-VG, $45 [tough get],--SOLD--
Street, SC ? [paper on back; VG+ front]; $20--SOLD-- 
Cree, Old Mill, BVG 4.5, $120--SOLD--
Harry Davis, Davis on front, SC 460/25, SGC 40, $80,
Doolan, SC 460/25, SGC 20, $55,--SOLD--
Dougherty, arm in air, Piedmont, GAI 3 [looks G-VG to me], $35,--SOLD--
Kissinger, SC 350/25, PSA 4(MK) [has two marks, actually: 3 star back-stamp and pencil erasure on front], $42,--SOLD--
Kleinow catching, Bos, Polar Bear, PSA 2.5, $140,--SOLD--
Lake, SC 460/42 OP, SGC 30, $33,--SOLD--
McGinley, Piedmont, SGC 20, $25--SOLD--
Orth/SL Piedmont SGC 55, $175,--SOLD--
Pelty, SC 460/42 OP, SGC 20, $28--SOLD--
Shaw, Piedmont SGC 20, $25--SOLD--
Foley White/SL, Old Mill, SGC 20, $55--SOLD--
Jumbolaya!--[measuring 2 3/4"] Kroh, Piedmont 350, SGC 20, $45,--SOLD--
Magee batting, SC 460/25, PSA 3, [STRIKE]$85[/STRIKE], $80--SOLD--

Ungraded:

Lajoie portrait, Piedmont 150/25, Poor [lots of creases but all there], [STRIKE]$300, $285, [/STRIKE], [STRIKE]$275,[/STRIKE] $260.--SOLD--
Elberfeld fielding, SC 460/25, VG. $65,--SOLD--


Trimmed:

BENDER, SC 350/30 [Looks Ex and full-sized, but trimmed], $85,--SOLD--
Lake, NY, Amer, Piedmomt 350/25 [paper-loss on back], $12,--SOLD--
Barry, Piedmont 350/25, [appears G-VG+ but trimmed], $20,--SOLD--

I'll. Take cy young if still available
